jedupdate.core_body:
Module for newsletter subscription in FreshMail system
## Functionality
- Custom fields management (Displaying, Required) - New subscription notifications by email - Option to use terms of service in form - Layouts - Limit module Impressions or Duration or hide after registration - Ajax (req. Joomla 3.1+) - Subscription list selection
___ For more details, see [Extension page](http://freshmail.com/plugin/joomla-newsletter/)
